personal.name: MIRAS Romain
personal.title: Software Engineer & DevOps Specialist
personal.bio:
5th year student at Polytech Grenoble (Computer Science), currently doing a DevOps/Backend internship until mid-September 2025.

My journey started with a Computer Science DUT in Grenoble, where I acquired solid foundations in software and web development. Since then, I've specialized in various technical environments, with a particular appetite for collaborative projects and solving concrete problems.

During my experiences, I've worked on projects combining backend development (Node.js, Python...), DevOps (CI/CD, Docker, GitLab), and sometimes frontend (React). I enjoy exploring the entire application lifecycle, from design to production deployment.

I'm open to permanent contract opportunities in DevOps, Backend or FullStack from September 2025, in France or internationally.

projects.title: OS Portfolio
projects.description: Immersive portfolio simulating an operating system
projects.longDescription: A unique interactive portfolio that simulates the experience of a custom operating system. Developed with React, TypeScript and TailwindCSS, it offers an innovative user interface with draggable windows, an interactive terminal and smooth animations using Framer Motion.

projects.title: Personal Server on Raspberry Pi
projects.description: Installation and management of a self-hosted multifunction server on Raspberry Pi
projects.longDescription: Personal project involving the installation and configuration of a multifunction server on Raspberry Pi. I set up the system (Raspberry Pi OS), installed and maintained several services: web server (Apache with reverse proxy and HTTPS via Letâ€™s Encrypt), file server (Samba), automated backup tools, network monitoring, and hosting of static/dynamic sites accessible locally and remotely.

projects.title: My Best Menus
projects.description: Balanced menu website with CI/CD and automated cloud infrastructure
projects.longDescription: University project carried out by a team of 6, aiming to develop a web platform offering weekly personalized balanced menus according to user preferences. I acted as Lead Developer, leading the technical design, setting up cloud infrastructure on Azure via Terraform, and automating CI/CD deployments. The application was developed with React for the frontend and Spring Boot for the backend, ensuring robustness, scalability, and DevOps best practices.

projects.title: Sea Of Crabes
projects.description: Award-winning Game Jam project: development of an isometric game in native Java with a custom graphics engine.
projects.longDescription: Project completed during a three-week Game Jam at Polytech Grenoble, led by a team of 7 third-year engineering students. I served as project manager and lead developer. We designed a 2D isometric rendering engine in native Java from scratch and developed all game mechanics. This project won first place in the competition, demonstrating our ability to manage a complete development cycle, from technical design to delivering a functional product within tight deadlines.

projects.title: Tech a Way
projects.description: Web project for the development of the Tech A Way client website.
projects.longDescription: Tech a Way is a recruitment agency specialized in the tech sector, operating fully remotely and across Europe. This academic project involved developing a complete web platform in PHP to facilitate the recruitment process, from candidate application to final hiring. The platform features candidate management, job postings, and recruiter dashboards, providing an end-to-end solution for tech recruitment. The project was carried out as a client assignment for 'Tech A Way', with a focus on delivering a robust, user-friendly, and secure recruitment site tailored to the client's needs.

experience.description: Final year engineering internship at VISEO Grenoble. Implementation of DevOps processes for web projects on Azure/AWS Cloud. Maintenance and creation of CI/CD solutions on Azure DevOps and GitLab CI. Development and maintenance of .NET and Spring backend solutions. Deployment automation and infrastructure as code management.
Development and maintenance of the Redtaag web application as well as an Android mobile application.
Evolution and maintenance of the orthopedic management web application. Development of new features and bug fixes. Work with modern web technologies and participation in improving user experience.
